content: Hello guys,UPDATE - 1st Giveaway Closed - Winner: elskerlinn----Original postIt's my first post so hi everyone !I'm planning of launching a crypto gambling contest newsletter. The concept is very simple, every week we partner with a crypto casino and allow one of our subscribers to win a few hundreds or low thousands dollars to be spent at the casino partner platform.On one side the casino operator gets a marketing promotion which will eventually results in traffic. On the other side, the members of the newsletter get a chance to win free money to be played. The newsletter would obviously be free to subscribe to.What do you guys think ? I need your feedback as players and therefore potential subscribers.I've talked to a few crypto casinos and I've already some that might be interested to partner for the launch.----FAQWhat is Waggger.com :We are a rewards club for crypto casino players. Every week we organise, in partnership with one or multiple casino partners, a contest where we give away bonuses to be played at their casino.What can I win :The exact figures greatly vary from one casino partner to the next. However, the reward structure remain similar.The winner gets a no deposit bonus of a few hundred dollars to be played at the casino partner with a wager requirement.That’s our plan at the start. Obviously, if we get a good traction, the winner’s bonus will considerably increase to the thousands of dollars.Do I still get something if I didn’t win :Depending on the casino partner, you can still get a small no deposit bonus in order to always incentivise everyone to participate.It’s a win win for everyone !How can I participate :First, you need to subscribe to our website. All you need to do is enter your email. Nothing else.Every Friday, you will receive an email with the instruction for the next giveaway. 24h later, we will randomly draw one winner that fits all the criteria mentioned above. The winner will be announced on social medias and email. Is it free :It’s 100% free. Subscribing to our website and taking part to the giveaways is totally free.What’s the catch :There isn’t any. Crypto casinos are constantly looking for new players or new ways to incentivise their existing player base. We simply act as a promotion platform for them by creating weekly contest.Is your website safe :Our website is built on a platform named Beehiiv. It’s a renowned newsletter platform that is being backed by venture capital. Apart from your email, we do not ask for any sensitive information such as credit card details, personal address …Does it require KYC :We do not ask for KYC. However, each crypto casino has its own KYC policy. Therefore, you might have to go through it at some point, like you would normally do, in order to withdraw your winnings.Is waggger.com a casino :No we are not. We are a rewards club for crypto casino players.Where is the bonus money coming from :As of today, the bonuses are sponsored by our casino partners. At some stage, we plan to subsidise the bonuses ourselves in order to give away bigger rewards.How are the winners being picked :We use a professional software named Rafflys that randomly selects a winner among the eligible participants.How do you pick the casino :We only work with crypto casinos that have a public credibility. We thoroughly review them in order to make sure they provide a safe place to play.
